#include<stdio.h>
int digit(int n1){
	if(n1<10)
		return n1;
	else
		return n1%10+digit(n1/10);
}
int prime(int d){
	int i,j=d/2;
	if(d<2)
		return 0;
	for(i=2;i<=j;i++){
		if(d%i==0)
			return 0;
	}
	return 1;
}
int main(){
	int test;
	int arr[4]={2,3,5,7};
	scanf("%d",&test);
	
	while(test--){
		long int d,n1,n2,i,count=0,temp;
		scanf("%ld%ld",&n1,&n2);
		
		for(;n1<=n2;n1++){
			d=digit(n1);
			if(prime(d))
				count++;
		}
		printf("%ld\n",count);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
